wikibase-rdf-description: Wikibase extension that allows defining RDF mappings for Wikibase Entities
wikibase-rdf-save-mappings-invalid-mappi: Some of the mappings you specified are invalid
wikibase-rdf-entity-id-invalid: The entity ID you specified is invalid
wikibase-rdf-permission-denied: You do not have permission to edit this entity's mappings
wikibase-rdf-config-intro: Do not remove predicates used in mappings. Doing so will result in those mappings not being saved or being lost.
wikibase-rdf-config-invalid:
Invalid predicates:
$1. Your changes were not saved.
